name: War of Dice - Beta
description:
Roll the dice and destroy the enemy tower. Build your deck and battle against advanced AI. 

Gameplay
  • Throw the dice to the battleground and depending on the rolled face appropriate number of heroes will be spawned. 
  • Hit the enemy heroes with the dice to kill them.
Features 
  • Offline gameplay
  • Different unlockable characters 
  • Easy to play
  • Additive gameplay.

NOTE: This is a Beta version of this game for testing purposes.  If you find any bugs or if you have any feedback you can join our discord server or just leave a comment. 

Report Bugs : https://forms.gle/MPuYq9pC6v2hpZLj9

Releasing soon on Playstore. 

PLEASE GIVE YOUR FEEDBACK ON OUR DISCORD CHANNEL Official Discord Channel
